title: A Grand, Snow-Rimmed Canyon
description: A dusting of white highlighted the Colorado Plateau around the deep gorge, while shadows created a visual illusion.
content: A dusting of white highlighted the Colorado Plateau around the deep gorge, while shadows created a visual illusion.
